Flex

# Flex

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
flex-1
```       | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
basis-[n]
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
flex-auto
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
flex-initial
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
flex-none
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
